StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetReferralRUCs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @FY int SET @FY = dbo.GetFY(GETDATE())
SELECT DISTINCT Q.RUC, (Q.RUC + ' - ' + MO.UNIT_NAME) AS UNIT_NAME FROM MCRISS..QSN Q INNER JOIN MCRISS..MARINE_ORGANIZATION MO ON (Q.MCC_CODE = MO.PRESENT_MCC AND Q.RUC = MO.PRESENT_RUC) INNER JOIN MCRISS..RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON Q.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND Q.FY = @FY AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y' AND NOT Q.RUC = 'XXXXX'
SET NOCOUNT OFF
